long_description: we are committed to cultivating an experience dedicated to purity of craft + purposeful design. our deep commitment to our planet's well-being drives our eco-conscious mindset. we'll come up with a haircut that allows you to wake, shake, + go. we offer our services in three different locations including camden and portland, maine and boston, massachusetts. contact us if you want to chat.

generated_description: nomadic goat is a hair salon based in portland, maine, with additional locations in camden and boston, massachusetts. the company focuses on providing an all-inclusive, eco-conscious haircutting experience. nomadic goat emphasizes a waterless salon approach, aiming to minimize its environmental impact by suspending traditional hair shampooing until a more sustainable method is found. the salon offers a range of services, including haircuts, refreshments, and hair care for children under 12. nomadic goat is committed to cultivating an experience dedicated to purity of craft and purposeful design, nurturing the acceptance of self through exploration and empathy.
